howToSpeak.question: How to talk to NaviAI?
howToSpeak.answer: Tap the microphone button on the main screen and speak your question. NaviAI will listen and respond in a few seconds. You can also tap again to stop recording.

howToCamera.question: How to use the camera?
howToCamera.answer: Tap the camera button on the main screen. Point the camera at what you want to analyze and tap 'Take photo'. Then tap 'Analyze image' so NaviAI can describe what is in the photo.

whatIsAccessibility.question: What is accessibility mode?
whatIsAccessibility.answer: Accessibility mode increases the size of text and buttons, and can enable high contrast for easier reading. You can also enable read aloud to hear responses. Go to Settings > Accessibility.

howToCreateAccount.question: How to create an account?
howToCreateAccount.answer: Tap 'Create account' on the login screen. Fill in your name, email, and create a secure password. In a few steps you will be ready to use NaviAI!
